verses.text: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,

Command the children of Israel, and say to them, My offering, \add and\add* my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, \add for\add* a sweet savor to me, shall ye observe to offer to me in their due season.

And thou shalt say to them, This \add is\add* the offering made by fire which ye shall offer to the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, \add for\add* a continual burnt-offering.
The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at evening.
And a tenth \add part\add* of an ephah of flour for a meat-offering, mingled with a fourth \add part\add* of a hin of beaten oil.
\add It is\add* a continual burnt-offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savor, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.

And the drink-offering of it \add shall be\add* the fourth \add part\add* of a hin for the one lamb: in the holy \add place\add* shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured to the LORD \add for\add* a drink-offering.

And the other lamb shalt thou offer at evening; as the meat-offering of the morning, and as the drink-offering of it, thou shalt offer \add it\add* , a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD.
And on the sabbath-day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth-parts of flour \add for\add* a meat-offering, mingled with oil, and its drink-offering.
\add This is\add* the burnt-offering of every sabbath, besides the continual burnt-offering, and his drink-offering.
And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt-offering to the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;
And three tenth-parts of flour \add for\add* a meat-offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth-parts of flour \add for\add* a meat-offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;
And a several tenth-part of flour mingled with oil \add for\add* a meat-offering to one lamb, \add for\add* a burnt-offering of a sweet savor, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.

And their drink-offering shall be half a hin of wine to a bullock, and the third \add part\add* of a hin to a ram, and a fourth \add part\add* of a hin to a lamb: this \add is\add* the burnt-offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering to the LORD shall be offered, besides the continual burnt-offering, and his drink-offering.
And on the fourteenth day of the first month \add is\add* the passover of the LORD.
And on the fifteenth day of this month \add is\add* the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
On the first day \add shall be\add* a holy convocation; \add in it\add* ye shall do no manner of servile work.
But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire \add for\add* a burnt-offering to the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be to you without blemish:
And their meat-offering \add shall be of\add* flour mingled with oil: three tenth-parts shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth-parts for a ram;
A several tenth-part shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
And one goat \add for\add* a sin-offering, to make an atonement for you.
Ye shall offer these besides the burnt-offering in the morning, which \add is\add* for a continual burnt-offering.

After this manner ye shall offer daily throughout the seven days, the food of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD: it shall be offered besides the continual burnt-offering, and his drink-offering.
And on the seventh day ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.
Also in the day of the first-fruits, when ye bring a new meat-offering to the LORD, after your weeks \add are ended\add* , ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:
But ye shall offer the burnt-offering for a sweet savor to the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;
And their meat-offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts to one bullock, two tenth-parts to one ram,
A several tenth part to one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
\add And\add* one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.
Ye shall offer \add them\add* besides the continual burnt-offering and his meat-offering (they shall be to you without blemish) and their drink-offerings.
